about_the_game:
Slimesventure: Your Destination is a single-player strategy building and adventure game. You can build your own kingdom, gather the resources you need and process them yourself. If the buildings in your own kingdom don't produce enough, you can upgrade them!

But before you can build your own kingdom, you need to build a foundation. Make friends with the inhabitants of the neutral town, complete their quests to earn money for a place to sleep, and buy or sell items from various merchants.

But keep an eye on the clock, because you won't be able to live unscathed forever - after all, you're apparently a 'criminal'. You only have 100 days, by which time you must be stronger than the enemy. So plan carefully how you travel, trade and build.




It was a normal morning when a strong gust of wind blew open the window and a letter from your mother flew in. It was barely legible, half burnt, but you could make out some key points. It said that you should make your way to the king, your brother.

You entered the great hall and spoke to your brother, but he did not recognise you, did not consider you his brother, and was angry at your unfriendly way of just walking in. You are chased from your home, but catch a train to the Neutral City.

Once there, you discover that you have lost your identity card and that you have no proof of identity. You go to the local authority to apply for a new one. [...]
